@Farva1996 It could be wildly wrong..... 😂😂😂

365 days in a year. If I live to be 75, that’s 27,375 days. Lets say 9000 of those days are spent sleeping. We are down to 18,375 days of life. Im 28..... which is 10,220 days lived. Including sleep, I have 17,155 days of life left...... don’t waste it people ✌️
